name: Atom - Periodic Table & Tests
description: Learn the basics of chemistry doing the tests and using the periodic table. FEATURES: • Periodic table test • Chemical valences test • All the elements of the periodic table • Atomic number, atomic mass, electronic configuration, electronegativity, oxidation states, bonding type, melting point, boiling point, density, year of discovery and valency • Molar mass calculator There will be more tests in the future!
